sourcesContent:
/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { TextField, Box, Grid, Switch, Button, Typography, RadioGroup, FormLabel, FormControl, FormControlLabel, Radio, } from "@mui/material"; import AdapterDateFns from "@mui/lab/AdapterDateFns"; import LocalizationProvider from "@mui/lab/LocalizationProvider"; import TimePicker from "@mui/lab/TimePicker"; import { useToggle } from "../../context/useToggle"; const Time = () => { const [pickTime, setPickTime] = useState(new Date("2021-12-01T21:11:54")); const [pickDate, setPickDate] = useState(new Date("2021-12-01T21:11:54")); const [timeToggle, setTimeToggle] = useToggle(false); // const [bill, setBill] = useToggle(false); const [timeData, setTimeData] = useState({ contact: 0, matter_name: 0, category: "", sub_category: "", hard: false, soft: false, unit: 0, qty: 0, rate: 0, file: "", time: null, date: null, detail: "", bill_by: 0, billable: false, note: "", }); const { contact, matter_name, category, sub_category, hard, soft, unit, qty, rate, file, time, date, detail, bill_by, billable, note, } = timeData; const onChange = (e) => setTimeData({ ...timeData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return ( onSubmit(e)} > Time setTimeToggle(e)} /> } /> {timeToggle ? null : ( Expense } label="Hard" /> } label="Soft" /> )} onChange(e)} id="matter" autoComplete="matter" disabled /> onChange(e)} id="contact" autoComplete="contact" disabled /> onChange(e)} id="category" autoComplete="category" /> onChange(e)} id="sub_category" autoComplete="sub_category" /> {timeToggle ? ( onChange(e)} id="rate" autoComplete="rate" /> ) : ( onChange(e)} id="unit" autoComplete="unit" /> onChange(e)} id="qty" autoComplete="qty" /> Receipt(s) )} { onChange(e); }} renderInput={(params) => } /> onChange(e)} id="time" autoComplete="time" /> onChange(e)} id="date" autoComplete="date" /> onChange(e)} id="detail" autoComplete="detail" /> onChange(e)} id="bill_by" autoComplete="bill_by" /> onChange(e)} /> } />
onChange(e)} id="note" autoComplete="note" /> ); }; export default Time;
